tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description:
Convert content from various sources to structured Markdown format.

    Args:
        source: The source of the content (HTTP/HTTPS URL, file path, or data URI).

    Returns:
        The converted content in Markdown format.

    Raises:
        ValueError: If the source type is not supported or conversion fails.

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Basic Markdown Conversion from HTML File
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否将本地HTML文件正确转换为Markdown格式

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to convert content to Markdown: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: '﻿

使用utf-8编码插入的HTML段落

'

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试从PDF文件转换为Markdown的基本功能

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to read file D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\paper1.pdf: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0xd0 in position 10: invalid continuation byte

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证是否能将.doc文件成功转换为Markdown

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert CSV File to Markdown Table
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试CSV文件内容是否被正确解析并转换为Markdown表格

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Failed to read file D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\test_mskanji.csv: 'utf-8' codec can't decode byte 0x96 in position 0: invalid start byte

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Remote URL Content to Markdown
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否支持从HTTP URL读取内容并转换为Markdown

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Client error '404 Not Found' for url 'https://example.com/sample-content.html'
For more information check: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status/404

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试不支持的源类型（如无效协议）时是否抛出ValueError

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Unsupported source type: ftp://invalid.protocol/file.txt

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证当提供的文件路径不存在时是否抛出异常

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Unsupported source type: D:\devWorkspace\MCPServer-Generator\testSystem\testFiles\nonexistent.docx

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试损坏或无法读取的文件是否被正确处理
